nodes.text: The GR-10 Plasma Core Blaster was a model of plasma blaster pistol available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The GR-10 Plasma Core Blaster was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on July 22, 2015.
